name: Minotaur, Ravening
description: The Ravening Minotaur is a large monstrosity known for its brutal and relentless nature. It has powerful limbs, a horned head, and abundant muscle, embodying a fearsome presence on the battlefield.
memorable: The ability to consume the hearts of fallen foes to increase its maximum hit points makes it a continuously rising threat.
goals: To engage and defeat its enemies in brutal melee combat.
relations: Often encountered alongside other chaotic creatures; may command lesser beasts in its territory.
environment: Typically found in labyrinthine environments or chaotic regions.
strengths: High Strength and Constitution scores ensure it can deal significant damage and withstand attacks.
weaknesses: Poor Intelligence and Charisma result in limited strategic thinking and difficulty in social interactions.
attacks: Performs a Multiattack with one Bite, which can provide temporary hit points, and two Claw attacks, which inflict slashing damage.
most_powerful_ability: Ravening Hunger, which allows it to consume hearts of foes, increasing its maximum hit points.
senses: Keen smell grants it advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks related to scent.
skills: Possesses a good passive Perception of 17, allowing it to notice hidden foes effectively.
additional_information: Charge ability for extra damage and knockdown potential.
Labyrinthine Recall allows perfect navigation in familiar areas.
Ravening Madness forces it to see allies as enemies.
Reckless ability for enhanced attack rolls at a cost.
Can infect targets with a ravening condition upon a successful bite.

fierce melee minotaur that heals from kills
powerful minotaur that consumes enemy hearts
